edit target content:
Forward propagation
 ℎ 1 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 0 +𝑏 𝑥 1 +𝑐 
 ℎ 2 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 1 +𝑏 𝑥 2 +𝑐 
 ℎ 3 = tanh  𝑎 ℎ 2 +𝑏 𝑥 3 +𝑐   
 𝑦 3 =𝑑 ℎ 3 +𝑒                        

Backpropagation
Let 𝑓= 𝑦 3  
 𝑑𝑓 𝑑 ℎ 1  ≤𝑎× 1 2 ×𝑎× 1 2 ×𝑑
 𝑎 >1⇒ lim 𝑛→∞   𝑎 𝑛 =∞⁡  –> Exploding Gradient  
 𝑎 <1⇒  lim 𝑛→∞   𝑎 𝑛  =0    –> Vanishing Gradient
content after edit:
Forward propagation
 h1 = tanh(a h0 + b x1 + c)
 h2 = tanh(a h1 + b x2 + c)
 h3 = tanh(a h2 + b x3 + c)
 y3 = d h3 + e

Backpropagation
Let f = y3
 df / dh1 ≤ a × 1/2 × a × 1/2 × d
 a > 1 ⇒ lim n→∞ a^n = ∞  → Exploding Gradient
 a < 1 ⇒ lim n→∞ a^n = 0 → Vanishing Gradient

edit target content:
Forward propagation
 ℎ 1 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 0 +𝑏 𝑥 1 +𝑐 
 ℎ 2 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 1 +𝑏 𝑥 2 +𝑐 
 ℎ 3 = tanh  𝑎 ℎ 2 +𝑏 𝑥 3 +𝑐  
 𝑦 3 =𝑑 ℎ 3 +𝑒                        

Backpropagation
Let 𝑓= 𝑦 3  
 𝑑𝑓 𝑑 ℎ 1  ≤𝑎× 1 2 ×𝑎× 1 2 ×𝑑
 𝑎 >1⇒ lim 𝑛→∞   𝑎 𝑛 =∞⁡  → Exploding Gradient  
 𝑎 <1⇒  lim 𝑛→∞   𝑎 𝑛  =0    → Vanishing Gradient
content after edit:
Forward propagation
 h_1 = tanh(a h_0 + b x_1 + c)
 h_2 = tanh(a h_1 + b x_2 + c)
 h_3 = tanh(a h_2 + b x_3 + c)
 y_3 = d h_3 + e

Backpropagation
Let f = y_3
 df/dh_1 ≤ a * 1/2 * a * 1/2 * d
 a > 1 ⇒ lim n→∞ a^n = ∞ → Exploding Gradient
 a < 1 ⇒ lim n→∞ a^n = 0 → Vanishing Gradient

content after edit:
Forward propagation
 ℎ₁ = tanh( a ℎ₀ + b 𝑥₁ + c )
 ℎ₂ = tanh( a ℎ₁ + b 𝑥₂ + c )
 ℎ₃ = tanh( a ℎ₂ + b 𝑥₃ + c )
 𝑦₃ = d ℎ₃ + e

Backpropagation
Let 𝑓 = 𝑦₃
𝜕𝑓/𝜕ℎ₁ ≤ a × 1/2 × a × 1/2 × d
If a > 1 ⇒ limₙ→∞ aⁿ = ∞ → Exploding Gradient
If a < 1 ⇒ limₙ→∞ aⁿ = 0 → Vanishing Gradient

edit target content:
Forward propagation
 ℎ 1 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 0 +𝑏 𝑥 1 +𝑐 
 ℎ 2 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 1 +𝑏 𝑥 2 +𝑐 
 ℎ 3 = tanh  𝑎 ℎ 2 +𝑏 𝑥 3 +𝑐   
 𝑦 3 =𝑑 ℎ 3 +𝑒                        

Backpropagation
Let 𝑓= 𝑦 3  
 𝑑𝑓 𝑑 ℎ 1  ≤𝑎× 1 2 ×𝑎× 1 2 ×𝑑
 𝑎 >1⇒ lim 𝑛→∞   𝑎 𝑛 =∞⁡  –> Exploding Gradient  
 𝑎 <1⇒  lim 𝑛→∞   𝑎 𝑛  =0    –> Vanishing Gradient
content after edit:
Forward propagation
 h1 = tanh(a h0 + b x1 + c)
 h2 = tanh(a h1 + b x2 + c)
 h3 = tanh(a h2 + b x3 + c)
 y3 = d h3 + e

Backpropagation
Let f = y3
 df / dh1 ≤ a × 1/2 × a × 1/2 × d
 a > 1 ⇒ lim n→∞ a^n = ∞  → Exploding Gradient
 a < 1 ⇒ lim n→∞ a^n = 0 → Vanishing Gradient

Forward propagation
 ℎ 1 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 0 +𝑏 𝑥 1 +𝑐 
 ℎ 2 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 1 +𝑏 𝑥 2 +𝑐 
 ℎ 3 = tanh  𝑎 ℎ 2 +𝑏 𝑥 3 +𝑐  
 𝑦 3 =𝑑 ℎ 3 +𝑒                        

Backpropagation
Let 𝑓= 𝑦 3  
 𝑑𝑓 𝑑 ℎ 1  ≤𝑎× 1 2 ×𝑎× 1 2 ×𝑑
 𝑎 >1⇒ lim 𝑛→∞   𝑎 𝑛 =∞⁡  → Exploding Gradient

content after edit:
Forward propagation
 h_1 = tanh(a h_0 + b x_1 + c)
 h_2 = tanh(a h_1 + b x_2 + c)
 h_3 = tanh(a h_2 + b x_3 + c)
 y_3 = d h_3 + e

Backpropagation
Let f = y_3
 df/dh_1 ≤ a * 1/2 * a * 1/2 * d
 a > 1 ⇒ lim n→∞ a^n = ∞ → Exploding Gradient
 a < 1 ⇒ lim n→∞ a^n = 0 → Vanishing Gradient

Backpropagation
Let 𝑓 = 𝑦₃
𝜕𝑓/𝜕ℎ₁ ≤ a × 1/2 × a × 1/2 × d
If a > 1 ⇒ limₙ→∞ aⁿ = ∞ → Exploding Gradient
If a < 1 ⇒ limₙ→∞ aⁿ = 0 → Vanishing Gradient
